featured.text: The donkey was so much weighed down by the wet sand that he could hardly get out of the stream.
This popular beach destination is now famous for its white sand beaches, slender palms, and turquoise seas.
With a continuous 3 km stretch of golden sand, the beach attracts artists around the world each summer to create amazing _____ with its fine soft sand.
A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

other.text: These buildings collapsed in heaps of dust and sand.
The next day, Amir loaded the sacks ___(38)___ with salt but with sand.

definition.zh_def: 沙子，通常是由小石頭或礦物顆粒組成的細小顆粒，常見於海灘、沙漠和河床。
definition.en_def: A loose granular substance, typically composed of finely divided rock and mineral particles, commonly found on beaches, deserts, and riverbeds.
definition.example: The children built a sandcastle on the beach.
